meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>borrowing</kanji> <kanji>task</kanji> is just another way to say <vocabulary>borrowing</vocabulary>. This is also for when you take out a <vocabulary>loan</vocabulary>.

借用 is a formal word for the borrowing of things like money, facilities, or other goods. You can also use it in a jokingly formal way in everyday conversation though, like ちょっと借用しただけだよ (I just borrowed it for a moment).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
